title: Strengthening Collaborative Educational Design Capabilities Through [Large-Scale] Social Learning Design Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of core instructional design theories and experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Social-sector instructional design competency development course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peer design activity patterns using community activity dashboards on learning design platforms
Learners can complete collaborative design projects through role allocation and feedback systems in social learning design environments
The CHAT theory-based community awareness tool can increase interaction in the learning design process by over 30%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
